body_html:
CuDNN 7.4 is out with NHWC pooling and batchnorm so I believe that this is now crucial for getting the best CNN training performance on Volta (as explained here https://devblogs.nvidia.com/tensor-core-ai-performance-milestones/ .)
It would be great if this could be exposed before the graph rewriting stuff appears. I personally like the explicit approach that's been taken elsewhere in PyTorch and would be keen to see this applied to layout too.
